verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> And His praise <S%H8416><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the godly <S%H2623><s%> ones. <S%H2623><s%>
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> in his Maker; <S%H6213><s%> Let the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in their King. <S%H4428><s%>
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> with dancing; <S%H4234><s%> Let them sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Him with timbrel <S%H8596><s%> and lyre. <S%H3658><s%>

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> takes <S%H7521><s%> pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in His people; <S%H5971><s%> He will beautify <S%H6286><s%> the afflicted <S%H6035><s%> ones <S%H6035><s%> with salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Let the godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> exult <S%H5937><s%> in glory; <S%H9202><s%> Let them sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> on their beds. <S%H4904><s%>
[Let] the high <S%H7318><s%> praises <S%H7318><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> [be] in their mouth, <S%H1627><s%> And a two-edged sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand, <S%H3027><s%>
To execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And punishment <S%H8433><s%> on the peoples; <S%H3816><s%>
To bind <S%H631><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> with chains, <S%H9108><s%> And their nobles <S%H3513><s%> with fetters <S%H3525><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%>

To execute <S%H6213><s%> on them the judgment <S%H4941><s%> written; <S%H3789><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is an honor <S%H1926><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones. <S%H2623><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
